name: Christmas Roller
description:
You play  as a chubby child named Billy who has to deliver a turkey to his grandma. The catch is, if you stay in the cold for to long, you will freeze to death. So be sure to take a rest at a checkpoint or drink some warm Chocolat Milk to stay cozy.

Dimensions and Graphics are a bit weird in the browser, the download hasn't got those issues.

This Game Was made for the WinterMelonJam 2022

AD ---------Move

W-Space--Jump

M  Mute--- Music (can't mute SFX)
